ComicInfo.Summary:
Now that Merlin and Morgan’s true colors have been revealed, they won’t let the Musketeers stand in the way of their plans. The Musketeers are in for the fight of their lives—and their souls. Can they finally learn to work together as a team in time to save themselves, and the city of Philadelphia?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Drew Edward Johnson & Ceci de la Cruz | 1 | B | Cover B | Robert Atkins & Ylenia Di Napoli | 2 | C | Cover C | Mike Krome & Ula Mos | 3 | D | Cover D | Sergio Davila & Sanju Nivangune | 4 | E | Heroes Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Keith Garvey | Missing |
